name: Crimson Song - Yuri Visual Novel
description:
It was only meant to be another annual visit to his mother's grave, but midway through Diandrir's story was shrouded in darkness. A Kinect visual novel about darkness and girls' love.

❤️ Kinect Story;
❤️ Dark and Immersive Atmosphere;
❤️ Duration: One hour less;
❤️ Steam Achievements;
